short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Vertical Tab Manager in Side Panel

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
What's New:
🆕 Delete Duplicates: Quickly identify and remove duplicate tabs with a single action!

Key Features:
📑 Vertical Tabs in Side Panel for organized browsing
📂 Tab Group Support to keep related tabs together
🔍 Search Tabs instantly for fast navigation
🖱️ Multi-Tab Selection: Select and manage multiple tabs at once
🎛️ Drag and Drop: Intuitively arrange tabs
🔄 Left/Right Side Panel Alignment: Customize placement under Settings > Appearance > Side Panel
🌗 Auto Theme Sync: Matches your system’s light or dark theme for comfort
🔒 Privacy First: Your data stays on your device—never shared

Productivity Boosters:
🔗 Auto-Grouping by Domain: Effortlessly keeps tabs from the same site together
🖱️ Quick Actions on Selected Tabs: Close, group, or duplicate multiple tabs in one go
⌨️ Keyboard Shortcut: Mac: "Command+Shift+P", PC: "Ctrl+Shift+P" (Adjust in Chrome Extension settings)

Introducing SideTab Pro: The Ultimate Vertical Tab Manager for Google Chrome

SideTab Pro revolutionizes tab navigation and workspace management, making it simple and efficient to browse with fewer distractions. With smart auto-grouping, multi-tab actions, and seamless search, your tabs are always organized, accessible, and ready for action. Enjoy a cleaner, faster, and more productive browsing experience!
